item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, December 19, 2024 at 5:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. An artist who trained rats to trade in foreign-exchange markets (127 points | 35 comments)
2. Nullboard: Kanban board in a single HTML file (52 points | 13 comments)
3. Show HN: Movie Iris - Visualizing Films Through Color Extraction (11 points | 4 comments)

10. Developing Developers (2015) (134 points | 68 comments)

12. trofaf – super simple live static blog generator in Go (11 points | 1 comment)

15. Borrow Checking, RC, GC, and Eleven Other Memory Safety Approaches (119 points | 67 comments)

22. Genesis – a generative physics engine for general-purpose robotics (140 points | 28 comments)
23. Torpedo juice: Legendary, illegal WWII liquor drunk in Alaska and the world (88 points | 52 comments)
24. Classical sorting algorithms as a model of morphogenesis (2023) (154 points | 67 comments)
25. The RAM Myth (152 points | 124 comments)
26. Apple Watch with Android (213 points | 126 comments)
27. In Defense of Y'All (125 points | 257 comments)
28. Amazon workers to strike at multiple US warehouses during busy holiday season (291 points | 292 comments)
29. Updates to H-1B (395 points | 1146 comments)
